item.title: Jen add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "A friend to all is a friend to none." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jen add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Dignity does not consist in possessing honors, but in the consciousness that we deserve them." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jen add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "When I was younger, I could remember anything, whether it had happened or not; but my faculties are decaying now and soon I shall be so I cannot remember any but the things that never happened. It is sad to go to pieces like this but we all have to do it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jen add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "A 'No' uttered from the deepest conviction is better than a 'Yes' merely uttered to please, or worse, to avoid trouble." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jen add a quote by Robert Browning
item.description: "What's the earth With all its art, verse, music, worth â€” Compared with love, found, gained, and kept?" -- Robert Browning

item.title: Jen add a quote by Naomi Shihab Nye
item.description: "I want to be famous in the way a pulley is famous, or a buttonhole, not because it did anything spectacular, but because it never forgot what it could do. " -- Naomi Shihab Nye

item.title: Jen add a quote by A.E. Housman
Jen add a quote by Oleg Kisselev
item.description: "Just because there are a few hundred other people sharing your lunacy with you does not make you any saner." -- Oleg Kisselev

item.title: Jen add a quote by Oliver Wendell Holmes
item.description: "Youth fades, love droops, the leaves of friendship fall; A mother's secret hope outlives them all. " -- Oliver Wendell Holmes
